28b6('bum): nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi
28b7('bum): dgyi 'am/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
28b8('bum): kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par ba bgyi 'am/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi
29a1('bum): bgyi 'am/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi dgyi 'am/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi dgyi 'am/ 
29a2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid
29a3('bum): la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi dgyi 'am// gsam gtan gsum pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ bsam
29a4('bum): gtan bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi dgyi 'am/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi dgyi 'am
29a5('bum): dga' nga chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ btang snyoms chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi
29a6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ cung
29a7('bum): zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la
29a8('bum): bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslang par mi bgyi 'am/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rdzu
29b1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslang par mi 'gyi 'am/ dbang po rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mo bgyi 'am/ stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 
29b2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
29b3('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am
29b4('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi ba gyi 'am/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi dbyi 'am
29b5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bsla ba par mi bgyi 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan
29b6('bum): nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi
29b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ byams pa chen po'i/ 
29b8('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ snying rje chen po man nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ kun 'brung
30a1('bum): ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi dgyi 'am/ 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ lam gyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'phags pa'i
30a2('bum): bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rten cing 'bral par 'byung ba lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang mi 'thun pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'dus
30a3('bum): byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'amabacom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag gi
30a4('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ji lhur byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la
30a5('bum): bslang ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'ad/ 'bar 'gyur/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis/ las ma 'das na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon/ 
30a6('bum): ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs na/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
30a7('bum): pa nyid ma thob bo// ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor na/ ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa
30a8('bum): chen pos sems can rnams 'khor ba las dgrol bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos la la zhig la mtshan nyid yod na ni
30b1('bum): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de la bslab par yang 'gyur na/ chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med cing gzugs med bstan du med thogs pa med
30b2('bum): ba ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pas na// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya// mtshan nyid med pa la'ang
30b3('bum): bslab par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngan cad mtshan nyid med par 'gyur ba 'am/ phyis mtshan nyid yod par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ rab 'byor chos 'di dag ni sngan cad kyang mtshan
30b4('bum): nyid med la/ da ltar yang mtshan nyid med pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya/ mtshan nyid med pa la
30b5('bum): 'ang bslab par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung // de bzhin gshe gas pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid med
30b6('bum): pa'i dbyings 'di ni de bzhin nyid du gnas pa'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad la mtshan nyid ma mchis shing mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags/ 
30b7('bum): mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags na/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
30b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgom par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar mi nus so// nyan thos
31a1('bum): kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpe'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa
31a2('bum): mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa bskyed par mi nus so// 
31a3('bum): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par ni mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ma bsgrubs par ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing
31a4('bum): yongs su dag par 'gyi ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar mi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par ma
31a5('bum): dgyes par ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid / ba par mi nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par ni chos kyi 'khor
31a6('bum): bskor bar mi nus so// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ni/ sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod
31a7('bum): par mi nus so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so// dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par mi nus so// rang byang chub la dgod par mi nus so// bla na med pa yang
31a8('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par mi nus so// sems can rnams sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so// tshul khrims
31b1('bum): las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so// bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi rus so// bcom ldan 'das
31b2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor sems can thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ mtshan nyid tha dad pa yang ma yin/ mtshan nyid
31b3('bum): gcig pa'ang ma yin no// gsol pa/ de ltar chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
31b4('bum): dka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin/ mtshan
31b5('bum): nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin te/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa bsgom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ 
31b6('bum): gsol pa/ da ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par
31b7('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
31b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
32a1('bum): tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
32a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
32a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
32a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sna rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lha rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
32a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus rnam par bsgo/ ma pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
32a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sgra rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
32a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dri rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ro rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
32a8('bum): bsgom pa'o// reg rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
32b1('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
32b2('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lha'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgob pa bsgom pa ni/ 
32b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam
32b4('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
32b5('bum): bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgo
32b6('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lha'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg
32b7('bum): de rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba/ 
32b8('bum): pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
33a1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gasna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
33a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lnga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi 'dus
33a3('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
33a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chu'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
33a5('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// me'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rlung gi khams
33a6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nam mkha'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ 
33a7('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
33a8('bum): byin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// / rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi
33b1('bum): pha rog tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ming dang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye mched drug rnam par sgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
33b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
33b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sred pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// len pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
33b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// srid pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
33b5('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rga shin/ ma par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
33b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan gnyis pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
33b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi rnam par bsgom pa
33b8('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// snying rje rnam par bsgom pa bsgo
34a1('bum): 'an/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// btang snyoms rnam par bsgom
34a2('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
34a3('bum): ba bsgom pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// cung zad med pa'i skye
34a4('bum): mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi stobs par
34a5('bum): 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sangs rgyas rje/ su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi
34a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos rjesu dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dge 'dun rjesu dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
34a7('bum): deshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gtong ba rjesu
34a8('bum): dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lha rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo
34b1('bum): pa'o// skyo ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
34b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'chi ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lu gyi ma su dran pa rnam par bsgom
34b3('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal ba'i
34b4('bum): 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
34b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes rnam
34b6('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
34b7('bum): sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
34b8('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gso ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
35a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye bu'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gang zag gi 'du shes rnam
35a2('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shed can gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rashwas bdag gi 'du
35a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byed pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba po
35a4('bum): 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shes pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba
35a5('bum): pa'o// mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa na~M/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ga pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
35a6('bum): pa ni ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bde ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par
35a7('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
35a8('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rdzu 'phrul
35b1('bum): gyi rkang pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dbang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stobs rnam
35b2('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam rnam
35b3('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mtshan ma
35b4('bum): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// smon pa med pa'i ti ngange 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi
35b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad na/ ma par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
35b6('bum): par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
35b7('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ti nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa med
35b8('bum): cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
36a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 
36a2('bum): 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ 
36a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// kun 'byung ba shes
36a4('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'gog pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
36a5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo/ ma pa'o// zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
36a6('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
36a7('bum): / nashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rjesu 'gro ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// kun rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
36a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dris pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
36b1('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
36b2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgo pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// @
36b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
36b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
36b5('bum): bsgom pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba bsgom pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom
36b6('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stong
36b7('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
36b8('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa
37a1('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
37a2('bum): pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa ba
37a3('bum): pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dor nga med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rna
37a4('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa bsgom pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
37a5('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa ra bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya na pa bsgom pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam
37a6('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ngo bo nyid
37a7('bum): stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
37a8('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgo/ 
37b1('bum): pani/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs
37b2('bum): stobs bcu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
37b3('bum): bsgom pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam
37b4('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byams pa chen po rnam pa ra bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
37b5('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// snying rje chen po rnam par bsgobabasgom pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa raH/ ma pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par
37b6('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
37b7('bum): pa'o/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
37b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam
38a1('bum): / par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha ro
38a2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
38a3('bum): gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
38a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na la du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnam
38a5('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom ba lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
38a6('bum): lags ji ltar na mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
38a7('bum): pa lags ji ltar na sna rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lha rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la
38a8('bum): ji ltar na lus rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
38b1('bum): ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sgra rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ 
38b2('bum): ji ltar na dri rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ro rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
38b3('bum): na reg rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
38b4('bum): na mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes ra
38b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lha'i rnam
38b6('bum): par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
38b7('bum): bsgom pa lagasaji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom
38b8('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
39a1('bum): na sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom par bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
39a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus
39a3('bum): te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
39a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa ba sgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ 
39a5('bum): ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par ba sgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom ba lags/ ji ltar na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyas
39a6('bum): gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol la tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
39a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji
39a8('bum): na sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chu'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
39b1('bum): ba bsgom pa lags ji ltar da ma'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rlung gi khams rnam par bsgom pa
39b2('bum): bsgom par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na na mkha'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
39b3('bum): ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa
39b4('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
39b5('bum): ji ltar na 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagasaji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
39b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na ming dang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye
39b7('bum): mched drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
39b8('bum): lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sred pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
40a1('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na len pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na srid pa rnam pa
40a2('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
40a3('bum): / rga shi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ 
40a4('bum): ji ltar na dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi
40a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bas ma gtan gnyis pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ 
40a6('bum): ji ltar na bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
40a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rje rnam par bsgom
40a8('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na dga' ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
40b1('bum): btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgo
40b2('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
40b3('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du
40b4('bum): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'a jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs
40b5('bum): rgyas rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
40b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
40b7('bum): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gtong ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
40b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lha rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skyo ba rjes su dran
41a1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa
41a2('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'chi ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
41a3('bum): ltar na lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgo
41a4('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
41a5('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na mi sdug
41a6('bum): pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
41a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sems
41a8('bum): can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes ra
41b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags pa ji ltar na skye ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gso ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
41b2('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skyes bu'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gang zag gi
41b3('bum): 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shed can gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
41b4('bum): ba bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shed bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na byed pa po'i 'du shes
41b5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya na pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol
41b6('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na shes pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mthong ba po'i 'du
41b7('bum): shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
41b8('bum): lags/ ji ltar na bde ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ 
42a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ 
42a2('bum): ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol
42a3('bum): tu byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dbang po rnam par bsgom pa
42a4('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag sa ji ltar na stobs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
42a5('bum): ji ltar na byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par bsgom pa bsgo ma pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
42a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma med
42a7('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na smod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi ba
42a8('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i
42b1('bum): rnams par 'jug pa dathun pa par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa tong nge 'dzin rnam par brlom
42b2('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
42b3('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal
42b4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun la byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
42b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'a/ gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa ba sgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ 
42b6('bum): ji ltar na lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na sdug bsngal shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
42b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'gog pa shes pa rnam par
42b8('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
43a1('bum): na zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
43a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rje su 'gro ba shes pa
43a3('bum): / rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun rdzob shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
43a4('bum): ji ltar na 'dris pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
43a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
43a6('bum): na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
43a7('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar
43a8('bum): na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rna rgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag/ ji lta na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol
43b1('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgob pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
43b2('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa
43b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagasaji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
43b4('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom
43b5('bum): pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lag sa/ ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par ba sgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
43b6('bum): lags/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid rnam
43b7('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagasaji ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
43b8('bum): lags da ji ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
44a1('bum): bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
44a2('bum): ji ltar na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa legs/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
44a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags// ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo
44a4('bum): bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
44a5('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gzungs kyi sgo
44a6('bum): thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol
44a7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam
44a8('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
44b1('bum): byin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na byams pa chen po rnam par bsgob pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
44b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lan cig phyir
44b3('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
44b4('bum): byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dgra bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ba sgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rang byang chub rnam par
44b5('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
44b6('bum): ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa tham
44b7('bum): cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
44b8('bum): stong phrag brgya pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
45a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'du shes
45a2('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mig dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
45a3('bum): sgom mo// rna ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sna dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lce dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lus dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
45a4('bum): sbom mo// yid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi slob mo// gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sgra dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dri dngos po
45a5('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// ro dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// reg dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chos dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgo mo// 
45a6('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
45a7('bum): sgom mo// lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po
45a8('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sna'i 'dus te
45b1('bum): reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te
45b2('bum): reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod
45b3('bum): ces byab mi sdom mo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngam pa yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lce'i 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngom pa yod ces bya bar mi sgog// 
45b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 
45b5('bum): sa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chu'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// ma'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rlung
45b6('bum): gi khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// na mkha'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 
45b7('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// ma rig pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rnam par
45b8('bum): shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// ming dang gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// skye mched drug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// reg pa
46a1('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// tshor ba dngos pa yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sred pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// len pa dngos po
46a2('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// srid pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// skye ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rga shi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// blang
46a3('bum): ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bsam gtan dang po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bsam gtan gnyis pa dngos
46a4('bum): po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bsam gtan gsum pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bsam gtan pa zhi ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// byams pa
46a5('bum): ngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// snying rje dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dga' ba dngos po yo da ces bya bar mi sgom mo// btang snyoms dngos po
46a6('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par
46a7('bum): 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
46a8('bum): kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sangs rgyas rje su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chos rjesu dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dge 'dun rjesu
46b1('bum): dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// tshul khrims rjesu dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// gtong ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lha rje su dran pa
46b2('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// skyo ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'chi ba
46b3('bum): rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sdug
46b4('bum): bsngal ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bdag med pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar
46b5('bum): mi sgom mo// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sems can gyi 'du shes dngos po yod
46b6('bum): ces bya bar mi sgom mo// srog gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// skye ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// gso ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya
46b7('bum): bar mi sgom mo// skyes bu'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// gang zag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// shed can gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces
46b8('bum): bya bar mi sgom mo// shed bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// byed pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom// tshor ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod kyab mi sgom mo// 
47a1('bum): shes pa po'i 'du shes dngos pa yod ces bya bar pi sgom lo// mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar ba sgor lo// rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos pa med ces
47a2('bum): bar mi sgor po// bde ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi skye mo// dran
47a3('bum): banye bar gdag pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar bsgomo/ 
47a4('bum): dbang po rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// stob sa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom
47a5('bum): mo lam dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// stong pa nyid kye ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mtsha nam med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom
47a6('bum): mo sbyor ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi skor mo// rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
47a7('bum): dgu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin
47a8('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgo mo// 
47b1('bum): kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lam 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces
47b2('bum): bya bar mi skor lo// sdug bsngal shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// kun 'byung ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'gog pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgor
47b3('bum): ro// lab shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// zad pa shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mi skye ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chos shes pa da
47b4('bum): be yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// kun rdzob shes pa dngos po yo da ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 'dris pa shes pa dngos po lo da ces bya bar mi sgor ro// sgra ji bzhin shes pa dngos po
47b5('bum): yod ces bya bar mi skor po// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa po yod ces bya bar mi sgor lo// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom ro// 
47b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod
47b7('bum): ces bya bar mi sgom mo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya ba
47b8('bum): mi sgom mo// phyi dang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rin po stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
48a1('bum): rlom mo// don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar ba sgom mo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar bsgom mo// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
48a2('bum): ngo yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dor ba
48a3('bum): meng pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom ro// 
48a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar ba sgom mo// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos po
48a5('bum): yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mngon
48a6('bum): bar shes pa drug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// ting nge 'dzin thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// de bzhin
48a7('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// so so yang dag par rigs pa bani dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom
48a8('bum): mo sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// byams pa chen po dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// snying rje chen po dngos pa yod ces bya bar bsgom
48b1('bum): / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
48b2('bum): sgom mo// dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// rang byang chub dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// 
48b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dngos po yongs su bya bar mi sgom mo// de ci'i phyir zhe
48b4('bum): na/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la shes rab kyi pha ro/ la tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos
48b5('bum): ngo'i 'du shes can la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgo ma ba med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du
48b6('bum): can la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa
48b7('bum): meng ngo do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la byi stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
48b8('bum): bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa mang ngo // dngos po'i 'du shes can la don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
49a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgob pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'dus pa byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes cad la batha' las 'das pa
49a2('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la thog ma dang thar med bstong pa nyid bsgom pa mang ngo // dngos po'i 'du shes can la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos
49a3('bum): po'i 'du shes can la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa mang ngo // dngos po'i 'du shes can la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang gi mtshan nyid
49a4('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa med ngo do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po 'i 'du shes can la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med
49a5('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa me da // dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos po med pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i
49a6('bum): 'du shes can la mngon par shes pa drug bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la gzungs kyi sgo
49a7('bum): thams cad bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa med do// dngos
49a8('bum): po'i 'du shes can la so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
49b1('bum): byams pa chen po bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la snying rje chen po bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i
49b2('bum): 'du shes can la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dgra bcom pa nyid
49b3('bum): bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang byang chub bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
49b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa med do//  ngos po'i 'du shes can la bag chags kyi maralas sbyor nga'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba med do// de ci'i phyir
49b5('bum): zhe na/ 'di ltar de dngos po la ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' ga nyis la chags te/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / 
49b6('bum): shes rab dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong
49b7('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nying dang / 
49b8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo sa
50a1('bum): song stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig
50a2('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig
50a3('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bag
50a4('bum): rags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spo nga ba la 'di ni bdag go zhes mtha' gnyis la chags pa ra gyur pas/ gang mtha' gnyis la chags pa de la ni thar
50a5('bum): pa med do// de ci'i phyir de na/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'a du shes can la ni sbyin pa med/ tshul khrims kyang mad/ bzod pa'ang mang/ brtson 'grus kyang med/ bsam gangan
50a6('bum): yang med / shes rab kyang mad/ lam yang med/ ye shes kyang med/ thob pa'ang med/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med/ 'thun pa'i bzod pa'ang med/ gzugs kyang yongs su shes
50a7('bum): pa med/ tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ mig kyang yongs
50a8('bum): su shes pa med/ rnanga'ang yongs su shes pa med/ sna'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lce'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyang yongs su shes pa med/ yid kyang yongs su shes pa med// gzug
50b1('bum): kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sgra yang yongs su shes pa med/ dri yang yongs su shes pa reng/ ro yang yongs su shes pa med/ reg kyang yongs su shes pa med/ chos kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 
50b2('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang
50b3('bum): yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa mad/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ rna
50b4('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ sna'i 'a dus te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa meng / lce'i 'du sa te reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi 'dus
50b5('bum): reg pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ya nga yongs su shes pa med/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
50b6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ sna 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
50b7('bum): nga'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa mang/ sa'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ chu'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa
50b8('bum): med ma'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rlung gi khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ na mkha'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 
51a1('bum): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ ma rig pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa yang yongs su shes pa
51a2('bum): mdang ming dang gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sku mched drug kyang yongs su shes pa med/ reg pa'ang yongs su shes pa mad/ tshor ba yang yongs su shes pa medang / sred pa'ang yongs su shes pa
51a3('bum): mang / len pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ srid pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ skye ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ rga shi'ang yongs su shes pa med/ blang ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ 
51a4('bum): dor ba yang yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan dang por nga yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan gnyis pa ya nga yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan gsum pa yang yang
51a5('bum): su shes pa med/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ byams pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ snying rje'ang yongs su shes pa med/ dga' ba'ang yongs
51a6('bum): shes pa med/ btang snyoms kyang yongs su shes pa med/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongs
51a7('bum): su shes pa med/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa yang yongs su shes
51a8('bum): med/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ chos rjes su dran pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ tshul khrims rjes su
51b1('bum): dra pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ lha rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ skyo ba rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med
51b2('bum): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ 'chi ba rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ mi rtag
51b3('bum): pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bdag med pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyang yongasasu
51b4('bum): shes pa med/ dngos po med pa'i 'du shes kyang yongasu shes pa med/ bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su she sa pa med/ sems can gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes
51b5('bum): pa med/ srog gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ skye ba'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gso ba 'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ skyes bu'i 'du shes
51b6('bum): kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gang zag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ shed can gyi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ shed bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 
51b7('bum): byed pa po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ tshor ba po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ shes pa po'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mthong ba po'i 'du shes kyang yongasu
51b8('bum): shes pa med/ rtag pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bde ba'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sdug pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bdag gi 'du shes
52a1('bum): yongs su shes pa med/ drar ba nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rang
52a2('bum): pa rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ dbang po rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ stobs rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ lam yang
52a3('bum): yongs su shes pa med/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mtshan ma meng ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa
52a4('bum): mang rnam par thar pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ ma thar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang yo ngas su shes pa med/ rdeg pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas
52a5('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rtog pa med pa dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin kyang yongs su sha sa med/ rtog pa meng cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
52a6('bum): kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden
52a7('bum): nga yang yongs su shes pa med/ lam 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ kun 'byung ba shes pa yang yongasu
52a8('bum): shes pa med/ 'gog pa shes nga'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lam shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ zad pa shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ mi skye ba shes pa yang yongs su
52b1('bum): shes pa med/ chos shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ kun rdzob shes pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ 'dris pa shes pa yang yongs su
52b2('bum): shes pa med/ sgra ji bzhin shes pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyid pa pang yongs su shes pa med/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ bzod pa'i
52b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ shes rab kyi pha
52b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su shes pa med/ nang stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa
52b5('bum): med stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med// chen po stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 'dus
52b6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ thog ma dang tha ma
52b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid
52b8('bum): kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang yod
53a1('bum): su shes pa med/ nga bcang spong bsad kyang 'ongs su shes pa med/ dngos po mang ba'ang banang sdong pa cad kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mngon par shes pa drug
53a2('bum): kyang yongs su shes pa med/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang yongs su shes pa med/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang yongasu
53a3('bum): shes pa med/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang yongs su shes pa med/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang yongs su shes pa med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang yongs su shes
53a4('bum): ba mang / byams pa chen po yang yongs su shes pa med/ snying rje chen po yang yongs su shes pa med/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yongs su shes pa med/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
53a5('bum): 'bras bu yang yongs su shes pa med/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yongs su shes pa med/ dgra bcom ba nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rang byang chub kyang
53a6('bum): yongs su shes pa med/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa mad/ bag chags kyi mtshams skye
53a7('bum): ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba yang yongs su shes pa med na/ de thar par gyur pa lta ga las 'ong // gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dngos po mchis zhes bgyi ba ni ji lta bu lags/ dngos
53a8('bum): po ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ni ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gnyis ni dngos po yod pa'o// mi gnyis pa ni dngos po med pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan
53b1('bum): 'das gnyis zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'du shes kyi 'du
53b2('bum): gnyis so// 'du byed kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// mig gi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rna ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sna'i 'du shes ni
53b3('bum): gnyis so// lce'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lus kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// yid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// gzugs kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// sgra'i 'du shes ni gnyis so//

53b7('bum): shes ni gnyis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 
53b8('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du
54a1('bum): shes ri gnyis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so//

54a8('bum): shes ni gnyis so// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// byams pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// snying rje'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// dga' ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// btang snyom
54b1('bum): kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// mamakha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so//

59a4('bum): yod/ rtag pa'i 'du shes yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ bde ba'i 'du shes yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sdug pa'i 'du shes yongs su
59a5('bum): shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ bdag gi 'du shes yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga
59a6('bum): la yod// yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dbang po rnams yongs su she
59a7('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ stobs rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lam yongasu shes par
59a8('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ smon pa med
59b1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rnam par thar pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su shes par 'gyu
59b2('bum): ba lta ga la yod/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba
59b3('bum): lta ga la yod/ rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod
59b4('bum): kun 'byung 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lam 'phags pa'i bden pa
59b5('bum): yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sdug bsngal shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ kun 'byung ba shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la
59b6('bum): yod/ 'gog pa shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lam shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ zad pa shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la
59b7('bum): yod mi skye ba shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chos shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rjesu 'gro ba shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 
59b8('bum): kun rdzob shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'dris pa shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sgra ji bzhin shes pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod
60a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
60a2('bum): yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta
60a3('bum): ga la yod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur
60a4('bum): blta ga la yod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'a gyur pa lta ga la yod/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chen po stong pa nyid yongasu
60a5('bum): shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 'dus bya sa stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ 
60a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ thog ma tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su shes
60a7('bum): par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ chos thams cad
60a8('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la
60b1('bum): yang / dngos po meng ba stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ nga ba nyid stong pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos po med pa'adza ba nyid stong pa nyid yongs su shes par
60b2('bum): 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mngon par shes pa drug yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yongasu
60b3('bum): shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ so so
60b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byams pa chen po yongs su shes par 'gyur
60b5('bum): blta ga la yod/ snying rje chen po yongs su shes par 'gyurabalta ga la yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
60b6('bum): 'bras bu yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod// dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod
60b7('bum): rang byang chub yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su shes par 'gyur ba
60b8('bum): lha ga la yod/ gang la lam sgom pa med pa de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang ga la yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang ga la yod/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang ga la yod
