207a2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis pan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyis phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la 'phag 'i lam yan lag brgyad pas phan
207a3('bum): gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ 
207a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis 'dogs so// 
207a5('bum): sems can gang la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'a jug pa dgus pan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus
207a6('bum): phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ stong pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so// sems can
207a7('bum): gang la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
207a8('bum): gyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la mngon par shes pas phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni mngon par shes
207b1('bum): bas pan 'dogs so// sems can gang la ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag lani ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis phan 'dog so// 
207b2('bum): sems can gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus pa na gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la mi 'jigs
207b3('bum): pa bzhis pa na gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis phan 'dog so// sems can gang la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis
207b4('bum): pan 'dog so// sems can gang la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis phan 'dog so// seMn gang la snying rje chen pos pad gdag par bya ba de dag ni
207b5('bum): snying rjen po phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la thams cang shes pa nyid kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs so// 
207b6('bum): sems can gang la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis pan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pas phan 'dogs so// sems can gang la rnam pa thams cad
207b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyis phan gdags par bya ba de dag la ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis phan 'dogs so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji la
207b8('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sman 'dogs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
208a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas/ sgom 'dod pa rnams la rnom
208a2('bum): bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ gos 'dod pa
208a3('bum): rnams la gos/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la gnas/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang
208a4('bum): man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nong bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man na
208a5('bum): dang / byi rung / gser dang / dngul rgya sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba nas/ mi'i yo bya da gang yang rung ba'i bar du yongs su gtong ste/ 
208a6('bum): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dbul zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / ji ltar rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / 
208a7('bum): dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / yang dag par song ba rnams dang / 
208a8('bum): yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la yongs su gtong ba de bzhin du mir gyur pa rnams dang / de bzhin du byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la yang tha/ 
208b1('bum): dang du bya ba med pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag cing / sbyin pa yong su gtong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba med pa ste/ des tha dad du bya ba
208b2('bum): med pa'i sbyin pa byin pa bas tha dad du bya ba med pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
208b3('bum): pos byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de byol
208b4('bum): song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa ma yin no snyam na/ byang chung sems dpa'i chos ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni
208b5('bum): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas 'di ltar bdag gis sems can 'di dag la ni sbyin pas phan gdags par bya'o// 'di dag la ni phan gdags par mi bya'o zhes bya bar bla
208b6('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ma yin te/ de dag sbyin pas phan btags nas/ rgyal rigs che zhing 'tho ba'i rigs su skye/ bram ze
208b7('bum): che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/ sbyin pa de nyid kyis phan btags pa de dag theg pa gsum gyis rim gyis phung po ma
208b8('bum): lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis
209a1('bum): gsang par gsol ba btab na/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chedapos spyan no snyam pab pa/ mi sbyin no snyam pa'i sems gzha
209a2('bum): bskyed par mi bya'i 'khrug pa med pa'i sems kyis skye bo'i tshogs de dag la sbyin par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni sems can thams cad kyi don du/ bla na med pa
209a3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir/ gal te rnam par rtog na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
209a4('bum): po de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / slob pa rnams dang / lha dang / ming dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
209a5('bum): rten gyis smad par 'gyur te/ de la thog mar sems can thams cad kyi 'gon gyi shig ce'am/ gnas dang skyabs dang dpung nyen gyi shig ces sus gsol ba
209a6('bum): gdab gdab ces spang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du mir gyur pa 'am/ mi ma yin par gyur pa dag 'ongs
209a7('bum): nas/ bdag ni slongs mo pa'o zhes yan lag dang nying lag bcad par gsol ba btab na de'i tshe des sbyin nam mi sbyin snyam pa'i sems gnyis su bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
209a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos des sems can rnams kyi don du ched du bsams te/ lus 'dis bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don tu bya'o zhes lus
209b1('bum): yongs su bzung bas na/ nges 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can 'di dag gi don tu lus yongasu gzung gzung bas/ de dag bslang mi dgos par khyer zhing de shig ces sems bskyed
209b2('bum): par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
209b3('bum): slongs mo pa mthong na/ 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad kyi rang bzhin dmigs su med na 'di la su zhig ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong su la ni sbyin par bya/ ci zhig ni sbyin par bya zhes
209b4('bum): sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshe ngas de dag ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid la ni gang la'ang yongs su gtong ba 'am// 
209b5('bum): gang las kyang 'phrogs pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa
209b6('bum): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dam/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dam/ chen po stong pa nyid dam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 
209b7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dam/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dam/ 
209b8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dam/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dam// ngon bo med pa stong pa nyid dam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
210a1('bum): dam/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// de stong pa nyid de dag la gnas shing sbyin pa gtong na/ de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
210a2('bum): rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad bar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa des/ phyi dang nang gi chos la gcad cing btubs kyang bdag la su'
210a3('bum): 'thub pa ma gcod do snyam pa'i sems mi 'byung ngo // // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bab pa sa ba dang ldag
210a4('bum): rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzig na/ shar phyogs kyi 'a 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
210a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ched du ba sems te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag du dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug
210a6('bum): bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems
210a7('bum): can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i
210a8('bum): cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga'
210b1('bum): ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas
210b2('bum): shing sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes
210b3('bum): shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs
210b4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag tshe da du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu
210b5('bum): dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsnga/ la zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su
210b6('bum): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba
210b7('bum): chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
210b8('bum): chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag
211a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag
211a2('bum): sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab
211a3('bum): 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
211a4('bum): chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongasu
211a5('bum): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang // cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can dmyal ba de dag la chos ston
211a6('bum): cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul
211a7('bum): gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos
211a8('bum): chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba
211b1('bum): chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg
211b2('bum): pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
211b3('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po'i
211b4('bum): sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can
211b5('bum): dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la/ chos ston cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su
211b6('bum): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
211b7('bum): dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos
211b8('bum): bar byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal pa ma
212a1('bum): bar skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
212a2('bum): gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems
212a3('bum): can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan
212a4('bum): pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis se mas can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing // rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can
212a5('bum): dmyal ba chen po sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yod su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis ches ston pa dang / byang chub sems
212a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de
212a7('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen
212a8('bum): po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyed shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas
212b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyar gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
212b2('bum): chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan
212b3('bum): pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul gyis sem
212b4('bum): can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
212b5('bum): dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i
212b6('bum): sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas/ rnam par ldang ba dang / 
212b7('bum): de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal pa mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa
212b8('bum): mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
213a1('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu 'dong zhing / sems can dmyal
213a2('bum): chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi ro 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjesu bstan pa'i ro 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis
213a3('bum): sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos ston cing // rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongasu bstan pa
213a4('bum): cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ngag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang // dag
213a5('bum): nga chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de/ dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
213a6('bum): ngag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang // de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas
213a7('bum): lha dang mi ngag dang skal pa mnyam par skyes shing / rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
213a8('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ rung byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
213b1('bum): ngag cheng du bsams te/ sems can dpal ba cher po dag du dong zhing // sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su
213b2('bum): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjesasu bstan pa'i ro 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems cad de dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phru
213b3('bum): gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub ser
213b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag/ byams pa chen po da pa/ snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / bta nga snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sems can da
213b5('bum): ba pa'i sems dung de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par lnga
213b6('bum): ba dang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal pa mnyam par skyes shing // rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar
213b7('bum): 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi byi ma snyeng dag na/ 
213b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag cheng du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba dag tu dong zhing / sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas rdzu 'phrul
214a1('bum): gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjesu bsdad pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can
214a2('bum): dag la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas nas/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis
214a3('bum): chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sam
214a4('bum): can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shi nga / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang
214a5('bum): bdang / de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas/ rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing // rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug
214a6('bum): bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
214a7('bum): dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ched du bsams te/ sems can dmyal ba chen po dag du dong zhing // sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byas
214a8('bum): nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang // rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can de dag
214b1('bum): la chos ston cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal de dag zhi bar byas te/ yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis
214b2('bum): chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang // dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po ma ston te/ des sems can
214b3('bum): dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag
214b4('bum): sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi dag dang skal ba mnyam par skyes shing // rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin
214b5('bum): pa mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
214b6('bum): bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
214b7('bum): dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi/ thugs su byon pa
214b8('bum): dang rnam gus pas ma yin gyi/ gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
215a1('bum): gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam dul
215a2('bum): chung mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyeng dag na/ byang chub
215a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan
215a4('bum): 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi/ dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi 'byon pas ma yin gyi/ thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi/ 
215a5('bum): gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang
215a6('bum): 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du'ang chung mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas
215a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs
215a8('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur
215b1('bum): bar ma yin gyi/ dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi/ thugs su byor pa dang / ma gus pa ma yin gyi/ gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyer bkur byed
215b2('bum): cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de'ang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
215b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du yang rung mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyar gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
215b4('bum): na byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur
215b5('bum): byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi
215b6('bum): dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi/ thugasu byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi/ gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub
215b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de'ang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
215b8('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du'ang chud mi gzor to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na
216a1('bum): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan
216a2('bum): 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi/ 
216a3('bum): dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugasu mi byod pas ma yin gyi/ thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pa ma yin gyi/ gus pa shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing // byang chub sems dpa
216a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ngag gis chos gang bstan pa de'ang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
216a5('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du'ang chu da mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 
216a6('bum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen
216a7('bum): bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi/ dgyes par
216a8('bum): 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi/ thug su byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi/ gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems
216b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
216b2('bum): par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du'ang chud mi gzod to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyar gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
216b3('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems
216b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan/ 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi/ dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin
216b5('bum): gyi/ thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi/ gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs
216b6('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing
216b7('bum): nam du'ang chud mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
216b8('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
217a1('bum): dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi/ dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugasu mi byod pas pa
217a2('bum): yin gyi/ thugs byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi/ gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom
217a3('bum): ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing
217a4('bum): nam du yang drung mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzi gas na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
217a5('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ 
217a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi/ dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi
217a7('bum): byon pas ma yin gyi/ thugasu byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi/ gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
217a8('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
217b1('bum): bar du 'chang zhing rab du'ang dung mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyad gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na
217b2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyer bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
217b3('bum): dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi/ dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugasu mi byon pas ma yin gyi/ thugs su byon pa dang / 
217b4('bum): mgus pas ma yin gyi/ gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen pa kur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos
217b5('bum): gang bstan pa de yang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog sa par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang 'ang nam du'ang
217b6('bum): chung mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyeng dag
217b7('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa'
217b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis
218a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / 
218a2('bum): des byams pa 'thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas/ rnam par ldang zhing rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag du skyes nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom
218a3('bum): ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos
218a4('bum): te de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ 
218a5('bum): theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na
218a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po
218a7('bum): byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
218a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu gdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
218b1('bum): ngag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing btubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa
218b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa 'thob pa nges byol song gi skye
218b3('bum): gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag du skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag
218b4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur bye/ dad pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de// dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa
218b5('bum): dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
218b6('bum): 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
218b7('bum): byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni/ de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
218b8('bum): la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i
219a1('bum): sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing btubs
219a2('bum): te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang rung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang
219a3('bum): dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa 'thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lnga dang
219a4('bum): mi'i mdu skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mnyes par byed pa dang / de da ga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byang
219a5('bum): pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / ded gnyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
219a6('bum): pa'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor
219a7('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang
219a8('bum): po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang dub
219b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ya
219b2('bum): lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
219b3('bum): dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa 'thob pa des/ byol song gi skye gnas nas
219b4('bum): rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / 
219b5('bum): de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed
219b6('bum): pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ rdeg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
219b7('bum): su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyad
219b8('bum): cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi
220a1('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas
220a2('bum): sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtungs te/ phyogs bcur
220a3('bum): rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems
220a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa thob pa dang / de dag byams pa 'thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi'i
220a5('bum): nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bstan
220a6('bum): dkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
220a7('bum): kyi theg pa 'am/ thag pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ 
220a8('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de
220b1('bum): sngar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzig na/ shar lho phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga
220b2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang
220b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems
220b4('bum): can de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams
220b5('bum): ba 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa 'thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas/ rnam par ldang zhing rnam bar langs nas/ lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / 
220b6('bum): de dag tu skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs
220b7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po
220b8('bum): 'am theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sem
221a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du dan tan byed pa de dag ni de lngar phan pa mang po
221a2('bum): byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho rung kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 
221a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
221a4('bum): de dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sem
221a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa
221a6('bum): 'thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par langs nas/ lha dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
221a7('bum): rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos thos te/ de bzhin
221a8('bum): nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya/

221b2('bum): byang chub tu sems bskrad cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
221b3('bum): nanung byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams
221b4('bum): kyi don tu bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag ngang nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs
221b5('bum): bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sha zos nas/ 
221b6('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa 'thob pa dang / de dag byams pa 'thob pa des byol song gi skye gnas nas rnam par ldang zhing / rnam par lang
221b7('bum): nas lnga dang mi'i nang du skye ba dang / de dag tu skyes nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes pa byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das deng
221b8('bum): la bstan bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs
222a1('bum): rgyas kyi rdeg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po pa lum pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su ril gyis yongs su rtsa
222a2('bum): ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid

222a8('bum): kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan
222b1('bum): 'das de dag la chos thos te/ de bzhin nyid du nad tar byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum
222b2('bum): po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
222b3('bum): po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di/ 
222b4('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na stang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
222b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
222b6('bum): yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs bcur rnam par 'thor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sem

223a2('bum): nyid du nan tan byed pa dang / de dag nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum po de dag gis phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
223a3('bum): 'das pa'i dbyings su rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
223a4('bum): tu sems bskyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam
223a5('bum): par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi
223a6('bum): yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas
223a7('bum): kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi sku gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas
223a8('bum): kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
223b1('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // 
223b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dam pa zhes brgya ngan drag pa/ rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sbyar gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
223b3('bum): gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yul
223b4('bum): de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji skad cig yod pa de dag tham sa cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa
223b5('bum): ngag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byam sa pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gan sa de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgra
223b6('bum): kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
223b7('bum): pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang dam yang 'bral bar po 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas
223b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rjer gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyeng dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
224a1('bum): chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na sdug bsngal ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna
224a2('bum): spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas
224a3('bum): kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten
224a4('bum): du skyes te/ phung po pa lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang rab yang 'bral bar
224a5('bum): 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzi gas na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
224a6('bum): klung gi bye sa snying dag ra/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag la sdug bsngal ji skad cig yod pa de dag
224a7('bum): thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byam
224a8('bum): pa'i sems spyad cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis
224b1('bum): lha'i 'jig rten dang / ma'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam/ 
224b2('bum): dang / nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
224b3('bum): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed
224b4('bum): cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing sar sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la
224b5('bum): byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye ba nas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa
224b6('bum): ba'i de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom
224b7('bum): ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs
224b8('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na
225a1('bum): sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag
225a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems skyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas
225a3('bum): rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das
225a4('bum): kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang na ma yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab la byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la
225a5('bum): rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'a jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
225a6('bum): yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing / ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sem
225a7('bum): can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag
225a8('bum): yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
225b1('bum): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rang 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
225b2('bum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
225b3('bum): can yi dgas kyi yul ba rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag na sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing / ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag ni
225b4('bum): sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / 
225b5('bum): de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten pa nga/ mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ phung po ma lus
225b6('bum): ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // 
225b7('bum): rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ra/ byang chub sem
225b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag ra/ sdug bsngal ji snyed rig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing / sar sna spang ba'i phyir
226a1('bum): ros stodan pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yaM dgas
226a2('bum): kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ 
226a3('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // @
226a4('bum): 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
226a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsnga la ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing / 
226a6('bum): ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed cing / yi dgas kyi
226a7('bum): skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang / mi'i 'jig rten du skyes
226a8('bum): phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // 
226b1('bum): rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sem/ 
226b2('bum): dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnam
226b3('bum): la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa
226b4('bum): dang yongs su mya ngan las 'dar ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'dara' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas
226b5('bum): shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du byed thams cad
226b6('bum): ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni
226b7('bum): yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lha su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor
226b8('bum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snang dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
227a1('bum): dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan
227a2('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su
227a3('bum): mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas
227a4('bum): shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni
227a5('bum): mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed tha mas cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid
227a6('bum): brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas
227a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen
227a8('bum): bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa
227b1('bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / 
227b2('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal
227b3('bum): med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thabs
227b4('bum): cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du bya du thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed tham
227b5('bum): cang ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed na mas la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di sangs rgyas kyi
227b6('bum): spyan gyis 'jig rjen la rnam par gzigs na byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ba snyeng dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen pozhi'i ris
227b7('bum): kyai lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / 
227b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ zag pa gsum po rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur ba dang / yongs
228a1('bum): ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong / rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag
228a2('bum): gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa 'du byed thams cad ni sdug ba
228a3('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos
228a4('bum): na yin na/ 'du byed thams cad la lta su zhig yid phebyas par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nus sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs
228a5('bum): ra/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnam
228a6('bum): la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems
228a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las/ lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
228a8('bum): dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas
228b1('bum): shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa
228b2('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba dang / 'du byed thams cad rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed thams cad la lta su zhig
228b3('bum): yid dbebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rang 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga
228b4('bum): gA'i klung gi bye ma sreng dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / @
228b5('bum): ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa da nga/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dadag
228b6('bum): las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan pa
228b7('bum): 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la/ gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur pa
228b8('bum): shes nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag red pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni ri
229a1('bum): brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ri rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na// 'du byed rnams la lnga su zhig yid pangs
229a2('bum): par gnas shas chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
229a3('bum): bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang
229a4('bum): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos
229a5('bum): nas/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan la sa 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngar las 'da' bar 'gyur
229a6('bum): ba mthong snga/ rab 'byor de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la/ gzhal med khang de dag 'dar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas

229a8('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston to// 
229b1('bum): rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang
229b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang /

229b4('bum): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan la sa 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor de la lha'i

229b7('bum): 'du byed thams cad ni yid brtan du mi rung ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid phebs par gnas shes chos ston

230a2('bum): dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/ theg pa
230a3('bum): gsum pos rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mthong ste/ rab 'bye
230a4('bum): de la lha'i bu gang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas shas cher myos pa de dag la/ gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur par shes nas/

230a8('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnam la chos ston pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan
230b1('bum): dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag las/ lha'i bu de dag gis chos de thos nas/

230b4('bum): po dag/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/ 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/
