230b6('bum): chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 
230b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skad / 
230b8('bum): chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyes ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sam
231a1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems
231a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig
231a3('bum): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye
231a4('bum): grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skye da chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag
231a5('bum): dang dral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos
231a6('bum): ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas
231a7('bum): kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
231a8('bum): sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang
231b1('bum): gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang / dral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
231b2('bum): snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor da ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du bya
231b3('bum): ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snang
231b4('bum): dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhe na pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams
231b5('bum): cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skad ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa
231b6('bum): mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor
231b7('bum): ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyar gyis 'jig rten la rna
231b8('bum): pang gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can
232a1('bum): gang dngas pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog
232a2('bum): dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snyi
232a3('bum): chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos
232a4('bum): rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'ji gartan la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs ma tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
232a5('bum): dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la ma ngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos
232a6('bum): thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang / bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ 
232a7('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar cha ste/ 
232a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmang du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho ru
232b1('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon pa
232b2('bum): zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de
232b3('bum): ngag dang / bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos stom
232b4('bum): to// rab 'byor den ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
232b5('bum): spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga nga ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems
232b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta bskyed/ chos tha
232b7('bum): cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang / bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
232b8('bum): po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmang du
233a1('bum): byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
233a2('bum): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sams can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos
233a3('bum): thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang / gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang / bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ 
233a4('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnam sa la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ 
233a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzig
233a6('bum): na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par
233a7('bum): zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba snyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang
233a8('bum): bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni
233b1('bum): ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam
233b2('bum): par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdud pa
233b3('bum): mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par
233b4('bum): gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA 'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po
233b5('bum): bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshe ga snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
233b6('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ra/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos
233b7('bum): po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / dor spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten
233b8('bum): la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis
234a1('bum): sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / ngon spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sbyar gyis
234a2('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po dag mir
234a3('bum): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don sprad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spya/ 
234a4('bum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rna
234a5('bum): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don sgyu/ da pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang
234a6('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gong gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' se
234a7('bum): dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// rab 'byor
234a8('bum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
234b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// 
234b2('bum): rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub
234b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ gzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / dor spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// 
234b4('bum): rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
234b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / 
234b6('bum): dor spyad pa dang / don 'thun pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// sa ba ngon 'du/ 
234b7('bum): rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis
234b8('bum): kyis sems can rnams sdud de gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
235a1('bum): zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i nga/ gser
235a2('bum): ram dngul lam/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai DUr+ya 'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byi ru 'am/ sa la sbram 'am/ zas sam/ skem 'am/ gdugs sam/ 
235a3('bum): gos sam/ spos sam/ 'phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ mal cha'am/ stan nam/ 'tsho ba 'am/ bud med dang/ skyes pa 'am/ rta'am/ glang po 'am
235a4('bum): bdag po yongs su gtong ba 'di skad du kye sems canangag tshur sheg/ bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bslang ma dgos par khyer cig long la deng shig ces brjed de/ 
235a5('bum): sbyin pa des sbyin pa de byin nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su gta ngo // chos la skyangs su gtong ngo // dge' dun la skyabs su gtong ngo // la la ni bslang ba'i
235a6('bum): gnas lnga 'dzin tu 'dzud do// la la ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i nye bar gnas pas gnas par byed do// la la ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do// la la ni
235a7('bum): ngasam gtan dang po la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gsum pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'god do// 
235a8('bum): la la ni byams pa la 'god do// la la ni snying rje la 'god do// la la ni dga' ba la 'god do// la la ni btang snyoms la 'god do// la la ni na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la 'god
235b1('bum): la la ni rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la 'god do// la la ni cung zad med pa'i skye mched la 'god do// la la ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la 'gong ngo do// la la ni sangs
235b2('bum): rgyas rje su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni chos rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni tshul
235b3('bum): khrims rjesu dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni lha rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni lus
235b4('bum): la mi gtsang ba las sogs pa'i 'du shes su so sor brtag pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
235b5('bum): bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// 
235b6('bum): la la ni dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stobs lnga la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni 'phag
235b7('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med po'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rnam
235b8('bum): par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa
236a1('bum): la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la lan so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// 
236a2('bum): la la ni byams pa chen po la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// 
236a3('bum): la la ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rgyun tu
236a4('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par
236a5('bum): skul lo// la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rang byang chub la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la
236a6('bum): yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par skul lo// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
236a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / thabs mkhas pas bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par 'god de/ rab 'byor de ni byang
236a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
236b1('bum): ba'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// 
236b2('bum): rang 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bshad pa dang / ma nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang / 
236b3('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i
236b4('bum): chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong du gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi spyi na pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
236b5('bum): dpa' chen po des 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sbyin pa de btang ba nas/ rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las bskyod de/ de las
236b6('bum): bskyod nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do// de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 
236b7('bum): 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
236b8('bum): pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
237a1('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / la
237a2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni rgyu ma
237a3('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o// sbyin pa
237a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// 
237a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// nang stong pa da shes pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi nang
237a6('bum): pa nyid shes pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid shes pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus ma byas
237a7('bum): stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa
237a8('bum): nyid shes pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
237b1('bum): shes pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o// 
237b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o// dbang po lnga shes pa'o// stobs lnga shes pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad shes pa'o// 
237b3('bum): 'bags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o// tshad med pa bzhi shes pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa
237b4('bum): brgyad shes pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa dgu shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong rapa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes
237b5('bum): pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams shes pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu shes pa'o// 
237b6('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa'o// byams pa chen po shes pa'o// snying rje chen po
237b7('bum): shes pa'o// dga' ba chen po shes pa'o// btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / 
237b8('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par de dag byang chub sems dpa'
238a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags
238a2('bum): kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
238a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ @
238a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// 
238a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhye na ba nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa'
238a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do// gsol pa/ bye brag ji lta bu zhig mchis
238a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa
238a8('bum): zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la mun pa med pa 'thob pa la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
238b1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten
238b2('bum): pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing
238b3('bum): thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa yin no// rab 'byor byang chub sems
238b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho sa kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang / thu na mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar
238b5('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po ldang nga/ stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
238b6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag dang / de bzhin ga
238b7('bum): pa'i spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
238b8('bum): dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byang bzang po brgyad cu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams dang / 'di ni 'jig rten las
239a1('bum): 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus
239a2('bum): lus kyi rjesu lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// 
239a3('bum): lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjesu lta zhing rnam par spyod do// 
239a4('bum): lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang la yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba'i rje su lta zhing / 
239a5('bum): brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan bas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mig de ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la
239a6('bum): kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyong ngo // tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang / zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// 
239a7('bum): tshor ba la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing
239a8('bum): brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung
239b1('bum): rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la zad pa'i rjesu lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rje su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la mi gnas
239b2('bum): par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi cho 'chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa
239b3('bum): dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing / rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la
239b4('bum): zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyong ngo // chos la kun la byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la mi gnas pa rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang
239b5('bum): bar len pa mang ngo // rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rna/ mas mi bskyed pa'i phyir mos par bskyed pa dang / skyes
239b6('bum): pa rnams spang ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / 
239b7('bum): bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos paskyed pa'o// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
239b8('bum): dang sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i
240a1('bum): ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o// dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i
240a2('bum): dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de dag ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o// stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran
240a3('bum): ba'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan
240a4('bum): lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi
240a5('bum): yan lag dang / shin tu byang ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan la ga dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ 
240a6('bum): de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag
240a7('bum): pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni
240a8('bum): 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting
240b1('bum): 'dzin to// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dberan pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// mtshan ma med
240b2('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste// de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// smon pa med pa'i ting nge
240b3('bum): 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ 
240b4('bum): gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang pa'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar
240b5('bum): pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mche/ de la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas pa 'di ni rnam pa
240b6('bum): pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni
240b7('bum): rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// 'du shes mad 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar
240b8('bum): bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la
241a1('bum): la 'dod pas dben sdig to mami dge nga'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
241a2('bum): gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rdog pa med
241a3('bum): pa/ dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran
241a4('bum): pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o// 
241a5('bum): zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan ga sum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing
241a6('bum): yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang / dran pas yongasu dag pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
241a7('bum): gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'da' ste/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed
241a8('bum): pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par
241b1('bum): 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag pa
241b2('bum): 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 
241b3('bum): 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye med la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 
241b4('bum): 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa/ ra 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi skye mched
241b5('bum): bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dgas dang / mtha' dag chu dang / mtha' dag me dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha' dag ser po dang / mthal
241b6('bum): ngag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha' dag na mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o// 
241b7('bum): de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog mi sdug pa
241b8('bum): mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te/ zhes zil gyis mdang te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o// nang gzugs su 'du shes
242a1('bum): bya tshal gyi gzugs dag pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis gnan te zhes zil gyis mnan te mthong dang / 
242a2('bum): 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong
242a3('bum): gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te zhes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltang 'du shes pa de na zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / 
242a4('bum): la gyis gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te zhes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'ju
242a5('bum): pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzu gas sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon por sdang ba mdog sngon po
242a6('bum): lha ste/ dper na me tog oM ma ka lta bu 'am/ yul bar na sar byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/ kha dog sngo bar snang ba/ mdog sngo bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te zhes
242a7('bum): zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnod pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nad gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po
242a8('bum): ser por snang ba mdog ser po 'di lta ste dab na/ shong gang shi kar ri me tog lte bu 'am/ yul bar na sar byas pa'i gos ltar sa ba kha dog ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mangs
242b1('bum): ser bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te zhes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'din zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o// nang gzugs med pa
242b2('bum): 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar por snang ba mdog dmar po 'di lta ste dper na/ man du dzi ba ka'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul bar na ser byas pa'i gro
242b3('bum): ltar dmar ba kha dog dmar ba dmar bar snang ba/ mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te zhes zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil
242b4('bum): gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar por snang ba/ mdog dkar po 'di lta ste dper
242b5('bum): na/ skar ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/ yul ba ra na ser byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba kha dog dkar ba dkar bar snang ba/ mdog dkar bar mthong yang gzug
242b6('bum): de dag zil gyis mnan te zhes zil mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan
242b7('bum): la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par spyod pa/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa ting nge 'dzin gang
242b8('bum): gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// smon lam gyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te/ 'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
243a1('bum): bo dus gsum gyi shes pa 'am/ shes pa gang dang / gang 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyis smon pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/ de'i smon lam
243a2('bum): yongs su grub par gyur cig shes bya ba de yang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o// de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i mig
243a3('bum): mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa zad
243a4('bum): pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go/ de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems so/ 
243a5('bum): su dag pa dang / ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go// de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba
243a6('bum): dang las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba
243a7('bum): sde/ bcu po de dag go// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
243a8('bum): mkhyen to// gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang las yongs su blangs
243b1('bum): pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// khams sna tshogs can dang / khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta
243b2('bum): ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du mas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan
243b3('bum): dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 
243b4('bum): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / 
243b5('bum): rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi na du rab tu mkhyen to// rnam pa du mas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rje su dgongs
243b6('bum): pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rab bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar du yang rjesu dgongs so// bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgo
243b7('bum): pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar
243b8('bum): dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go// ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// zas ni
244a1('bum): 'dar la'o// yun ni 'di srid gcig tu gnas so// tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ des
244a2('bum): shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so// zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so// lha'i mig ma
244a3('bum): par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can shi 'pho dang / skye ba dag kyang gzigs so// kha dog sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / 
244a4('bum): ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen to// sems can 'di dag ni/ lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa ngag gis ngan du spyod pa
244a5('bum): dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'pha/ gus pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas// ngan song log par
244a6('bum): ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngan gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phag
244a7('bum): pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o// zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa
244a8('bum): rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobaso// 
244b1('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba
244b2('bum): bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang
244b3('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas// bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlangs
244b4('bum): po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 
244b5('bum): gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gi rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do/ zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zang
244b6('bum): par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar
244b7('bum): 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par
244b8('bum): rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ 
245a1('bum): / bdud dpa/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chosu bstan
245a2('bum): pa de dag la bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyuraro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang
245a3('bum): ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / 
245a4('bum): mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po rje'i gnas su dam bca'o 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgru ba/ skrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam / bram
245a5('bum): ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzha na sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pi/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis
245a6('bum): lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo/ 
245a7('bum): zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyuraro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang
245a8('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa 'am/ bag tsha ba med pa 'thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa 'thob par rnam par spyod de// khyu mchog
245b1('bum): rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrago/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan
245b2('bum): sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa
245b3('bum): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag pa ste/ de
245b4('bum): dag kyang gang zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmi gas pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang / spobs pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung
245b5('bum): ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i rgyu da pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gsheg/ pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las
245b6('bum): shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ 
245b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa
245b8('bum): gnyis pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod yongasu ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong zhes gang
246a1('bum): / yang bcab par dgongs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ 
246a2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan tu byed na yang / des de bzhin gash+ye pa
246a3('bum): dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi 'gyur/ thugs yang yeng por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sem
246a4('bum): nye dar gzhog pa med pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan tu mi byed na yang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ra khro bar mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur// thugs mi ches par
246a5('bum): mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// / la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa 'i sems nye bar gzhog la chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan
246a6('bum): tan tu byed la/ la la rna btud de rim gror mi nyan cing / bka' nyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan tu mi byed kyang // de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa
246a7('bum): 'amar thugs khro ba gnyi su mi 'gyur te/ de thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum po'o// de la de bzhin ga
246a8('bum): pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la/ dus las mi 'da' ba ste/ 
246b1('bum): de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang / de dag
246b2('bum): la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu'ang / mi mngar ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ 
246b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brda' nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
246b4('bum): gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yong su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/ 
246b5('bum): de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshe gas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag/ nga zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// 
246b6('bum): mi mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// mos pa yongs su nyams
246b7('bum): be mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// 
246b8('bum): rnam par grol ba nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes
247a1('bum): 'brang ngo // gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes
247a2('bum): kyi rjesu 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la
247a3('bum): ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang
247a4('bum): la dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams ca da mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi
247a5('bum): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa dang / phyag pa
247a6('bum): zhabs bzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / gting pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba dang / zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil
247a7('bum): pa dang / ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu dang / phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang / gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / sU re
247a8('bum): nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / 'phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog
247b1('bum): dang / shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / tshems shin tu dkar ba dang / 
247b2('bum): tshems mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang / nga'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhadra
247b3('bum): kyi mthil la 'khor lo'i rtsibs stong dang ldan pa mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'di lta ste/ rus pa 'am/ ba so la gzugs brkos pa dang / 
247b4('bum): 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang lnga/ na pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing / zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o// ngang pa
247b5('bum): rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel pas/ phyag dang zhags dra bar 'brel pa'o// shing bal gyi ye'u ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs bzhon zhing
247b6('bum): 'jam pa'o// phyag dang zhabs dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu 'tho bas/ bdun shin tu mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o// gting ba ring bas gting ba yangs pa'o// 
247b7('bum): sku lag pa mdun du 'phags la drang bas/ sku che zhing drang ba'o// pus mo'i lha nga dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs legs par mtho ba'o// spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas las
247b8('bum): lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o// ri dgas a na ya'i byin pa dang / smig ma dang / ldum bu dang ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams la rims kyis gzhol bar grub cing / byin pa zlum pas ri dgas
248a1('bum): en ya'i byin pa lta bu'o// badz+ra drang pong bzhag ste/ ma bdud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas phyag brgya drang por slebs pa'o// gla
248a2('bum): dang rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyi kha
248a3('bum): dog go// gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i mdog du 'dug la sku la rdul mi 'go bas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o// shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing gnyis
248a4('bum): med pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyim pa'o// tog kun dang / zla ba dang / 'a ma dang / ba mo'i mdogaH/ ra 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'a
248a5('bum): gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas/ la mdzod spus brgyan pa'o// ro stod che bas seng ge'i stong ngo do// mgur dang rgyud lags par 'brel cing / lhun
248a6('bum): zlum pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o// gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyis pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas/ phrag so shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis ma nyams
248a7('bum): shing rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go// sku chu zheng mdom du mnyam pas shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa'o// dbu'i gtsug zlum zhing lags la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil
248a8('bum): pa dang / ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas/ dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ud pa la dmar po'i mdab ma'i kha dog ltar 'dug cing // shin tu yangs
248b1('bum): pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang bya ka la ping ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par grub
248b2('bum): cing / mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun da dang / dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin tu dkar ba
248b3('bum): tshems la 'thon man med pas tshems mnyam pa'o// tshems la mtshams ma dod pas tshams thags bzang ba'o// bla 'og tu gye gu med pas tshims mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o// dkar nag gi na
248b4('bum): ma dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing // mdog dkar pos ma yog pas spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu legs par gnas la ma 'dzings pas pa'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma
248b5('bum): bsu bskyal dang / chos mnyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug la ga khang dang / mchod rten rjesu grub pa las sogs pa la/ phu dung byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang
248b6('bum): ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so// yi dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltaso// sbyin pa dang / ngag sman pa dang / don
248b7('bum): spyod pa dang / don 'thun pa'i bsdu ba rnam bzhi goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel pa ste/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga lta so// bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing
248b8('bum): nyam su bde ba byin pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu 'tho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyam su bde ba 'thob pa'i snga lta so// 
249a1('bum): bcings pa bkrol ba dang / srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas/ sor mo ring ba dang / btings pa yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba ste/ 
249a2('bum): de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga lta so// dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon par spel cing 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong 'tho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du
249a3('bum): 'khyil pa ste/ de ni mi mnyam pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing gzhan byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ 
249a4('bum): de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga lta so// bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na mi 'gong par gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas/ phyag brla drang por slengs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mnga' ba dang
249a5('bum): dul ba'i snga ltas so// 'grogs pa dang mdza' bshes dang / gnyen pa ma phye ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par skul ba dang / gsang
249a6('bum): ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbub su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so// stan dang gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po
249a7('bum): byin pas/ gsar gyi kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni bdan dang / na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po 'thob pa'i snga
249a8('bum): ltas so// 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang / slobs dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro byas pa dang / btsun par bya
249b1('bum): ba dang / bcol ba rnal ma gzin pas spu re re nas/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltaso// mi snyan par mi zer
249b2('bum): zhing mi smod la snyan par smra zhing / legs par bshad pa 'thun par 'dzin pas/ seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang phrag pa'i lhun mdzes pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so// na ba rnams la
249b3('bum): rtsi dang rim gro dang sman pa dang / nyams su phan pa'i ngas byin pa dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nang nyung ba'i snga ltas so// bskyed
249b4('bum): mos tshal dang / 'khor dang / btung ba dang / rdzing bu dang / rgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / 'phreng ba'i gnas dang / stegs dang / gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs
249b5('bum): pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis gzhan byin pas shing n+ya gro nga ltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mang
249b6('bum): ba'i snga ltas so// yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smras pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga
249b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su shes shing / rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa
249b8('bum): med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / gtang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig khyal pa spangs shing dus su
250a1('bum): sna smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas// rim grong bya ba dang / brnyas pa red pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas
250a2('bum): tshems shin tu dkar nga dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi byed pa'i snga ltas so// yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra smra bas/ tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems
250a3('bum): mnyam zhing tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi byed pa'i snga ltas so// phang gis khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsam pa med la/ ma chags pa dang mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig
250a4('bum): gis lta lhangs spyan dkar dag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// darab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
250a5('bum): sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byang bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba
250a6('bum): thams cad la dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang / 
250a7('bum): bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sen mo mdog snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud 'thun por 'byung ste/ sen mo 'tho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
250a8('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni tshul la kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ 
250b1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang gsung dang sku
250b2('bum): phrin las dang 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa ste/ rtsal mdud pa med pa yin/ 
250b3('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i chos mngar ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol
250b4('bum): ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
250b5('bum): rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar na mkha' las bzhud pa ste/ 
250b6('bum): ngang pa'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
250b7('bum): 'das rnams ni 'thun pa'i lam mngar ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud
250b8('bum): ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhung ba yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam/ 
251a1('bum): par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ su shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ sku shin
251a2('bum): tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gtsang ba dang
251a3('bum): ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
251a4('bum): rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ da
251a5('bum): byang shin tu rdzogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
251a6('bum): rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas pa com ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu mnyam pa'i chos ston pa
251a7('bum): sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku zhums pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
251a8('bum): ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin tu mkhregs pa/ 
251b1('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag lags par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag sba bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas
251b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob
251b3('bum): ma mnga' ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
251b4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par zlog pa ste/ 
251b5('bum): phyal phye mar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chud pa ste/ lte ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
251b6('bum): 'das rnams ni 'thun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun
251b7('bum): mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs
251b8('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po snyan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la smra ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal
252a1('bum): ltar yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu lam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo
252a2('bum): phal las byams pas/ dge sbyong chen po brnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi rim
252a3('bum): zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas
252a4('bum): ha chang yang mi ring bar 'chang ba ste/ zhal ha chang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzug sa brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du dkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs
252a5('bum): kyi gzugs brnya snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom lda na 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba// ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
252a6('bum): rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting
252a7('bum): dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang / 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mngara' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang
252a8('bum): 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams
252b1('bum): bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
252b2('bum): ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba
252b3('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis
252b4('bum): mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ngo bo 'thon po la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs
252b5('bum): legs par 'tho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas
252b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag
252b7('bum): pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
252b8('bum): rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang / skyes bu dang / na dung mchog/ mig dkar nag 'byes shing / pad+mo'i mngab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba ste/ spyan
253a1('bum): dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+mo'i mngang ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan
253a2('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams
253a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems can sdum par gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ 
253a4('bum): smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ snyan lags shong snyan zhal ring ba yin
253a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam
253a6('bum): pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba lag
253a7('bum): par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyi rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
253a8('bum): rnams ni smon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi rung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu bung ba ltar gnas/ 
253b1('bum): pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa spang ba'i bag la nyal zad par byas pa ste/ dbu stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
253b2('bum): rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma la khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa
253b3('bum): ste/ dbu mi 'dzing pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung ba dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
253b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis skye bo 'thun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi
253b5('bum): be'u dang / dkra shis dang dga' ba 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin/ rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
253b6('bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang bstan pa dang yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi smin
253b7('bum): pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gis sbyin pa dang / chos kyis sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor don
253b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
254a1('bum): brgya pa// bam pa las brgya don brgyad pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas/ sems can
254a2('bum): rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
254a3('bum): phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
254a4('bum): rang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdung ngo // de ci'i phyir
254a5('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi sa dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
254a6('bum): chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor
254a7('bum): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
254a8('bum): de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don byabs sems can rnams sdung ngo // rab 'byor ji ltar na
254b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag
254b2('bum): gis don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar na
254b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don 'thun pas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'byung
254b4('bum): ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bar po
254b5('bum): gzhan dag la 'di skad 'dems shing 'di skad ston to// rigs kyi bu khyed tshur sheg yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par gyi shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyi
254b6('bum): shig/ yi ge gnyis nas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyi shig/ yi ge gcig gis byang de'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyi shig/ yi ge gnyis kyi byang ba'i ra
254b7('bum): bzhin thams cad shes par gyi shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyi shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi ga bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus
254b8('bum): sgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis mu yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig lam khas
255a1('bum): pa yin// yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin// yig
255a2('bum): bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/ la la goms shing yi ge med par mngon par
255a3('bum): bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa
255a4('bum): yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa chos ston kyang / rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de yang
255a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos/ dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin// 
255a6('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te mtha' le sa 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar
255a7('bum): bzung ste/ sems can gang shin tu mi dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
255a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrim
255b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / 
255b2('bum): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i
255b3('bum): ting 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
255b4('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang // snying rje cheno dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
255b5('bum): dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam par smi na pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas na sa/ sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ 
255b6('bum): la ni sems dran mi dmigs te/ sems can du bdags pa yang mi dmigs so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can
255b7('bum): mi dmigs pas/ tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'du shes dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 
255b8('bum): 'du byed dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas// mig dmigasu ma mchi'o// 
256a1('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ rna ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sna dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pa
256a2('bum): lce dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lus dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ yid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can
256a3('bum): mi dmigs pas/ gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sgra dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dri dmigs su ma mchi so// / 
256a4('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ ro dmigs su ma mchiso// sems can dmigs pas/ reg dmigs su ma mchiso// sems can mi dmigs pas/ chos dmigs su ma mchis
256a5('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchiso// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchiso// / 
256a6('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ snga'i rnam par shes pa dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas// lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchiso// sems can mi dmig
256a7('bum): pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas
256a8('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sna'i 'dus te
256b1('bum): rig pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigasum
256b2('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigasu
256b3('bum): ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
256b4('bum): tshor ba dmigs su ma mchi so// sed mi dmigs lnga lce'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems ca na mi dmigs pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
256b5('bum): tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmig sa su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 
256b6('bum): sa'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas// chu'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ ma'i khams dmigasu
256b7('bum): ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rlung gi khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ na mkha'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// 
256b8('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ ma rig pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi
257a1('bum): dmigs pas/ 'du byed dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi darig
257a2('bum): pas rnga ming dang gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ skye mched drug dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ reg pa dmigasum
257a3('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sred pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs

257a8('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems
257b1('bum): mi dmigs pas/ phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigasu ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ stong pa

257b3('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su ma
257b4('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mtha' la sa 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sem sa can mi dmigs pas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa

257b8('bum): mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchiso// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis
258a1('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ yang dag par spong ba dmigs su ma mar so//

258a3('bum): pas stobs lnga dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
258a4('bum): lag brgyad pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dmigs su ma ma chis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ bsam gtan ci
