297b8('bum): ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos ston pa yin no// rab 'byor mtshan
298a1('bum): pa gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'dir byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ga la chags par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs kyi mtshan pa dang
298a2('bum): gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang ma 'ong ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ 
298a3('bum): rgyang ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtogs pas bzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma gang
298a4('bum): zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang la yang rung ste/ mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags shing nyon mongs dpa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs meng pa'i mtshan ma
298a5('bum): zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol
298a6('bum): zhing mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhog ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o// 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o// zhes bya ba gnyisu mi ltung ba de ltar 'god cing gzhog ste/ 
298a7('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol zhing
298a8('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu 'god do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni de tsam du bas te/ ming dang mtshan mang bas la btags pa tsam
298b1('bum): du bas te/ yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag
298b2('bum): kyang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par thob la gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ 
298b3('bum): sems can rnams kyang theg pa gsum la sbyor ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te dngos po 'am/ dngos po med pa'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab
298b4('bum): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ khyad par thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par 'thob pa la sbyor
298b5('bum): bar mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma yang med// dngos po yang med pas na/ rab 'byor de'i phyir bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
298b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
298b7('bum): su rdzogs par bying // mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs
298b8('bum): par byed do// mtshan ma med ba'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
299a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
299a2('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spongs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med
299a3('bum): ba'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag dun
299a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa
299a5('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'ichu la gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang spong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par
299a6('bum): byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
299a7('bum): gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongasu
299a8('bum): rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs
299b1('bum): rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 
299b2('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med
299b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byang ngo // mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
299b4('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ma tshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
299b5('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yong su rdzogs par bye'o// mtshan
299b6('bum): ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
299b7('bum): yong su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongasasu rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ting 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byeda'o// 
299b8('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongasu rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pacu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma
300a1('bum): med pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yong su rdzogs par bye // mtshan ma
300a2('bum): meng ba'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas
300a3('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la skye
300a4('bum): te/ rang 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gzhag pa tsam gyi khyon gcig mtshan ma yod na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
300a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ chos mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yi da la byed pa med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab ra mi 'gyur te/ sems can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang / 
300a6('bum): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la bya ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ 
300a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
300a8('bum): 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis shing / dran pa ma mchis te/ yid la bgyi ba ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i chos so// 
300b1('bum): 'di dag ni mi dge bar chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni bag
300b2('bum): pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong gi chos so// 'di dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so// 'di
300b3('bum): ngag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang ba
300b4('bum): bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'a byor de ji snyam du sems/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ 
300b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sa mas/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ rang sangs
300b6('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
300b7('bum): rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa nyid rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// / 
300b8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa'i chos so// sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 
301a1('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/ 'di
301a2('bum): ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos
301a3('bum): rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
301a4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen
301a5('bum): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'du sa byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyidad dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang
301a6('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa
301a7('bum): nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu
301a8('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam
301b1('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par
301b2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
301b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
301b4('bum): brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pa dag gis rnam par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni stong pa nyid dang / 
301b5('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par byabam gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge
301b6('bum): pa'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo/ mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo/ mngon
301b7('bum): par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye
301b8('bum): mched bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin
302a1('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yid/ bsam gtan gyi
302a2('bum): tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ stong pa nyid
302a3('bum): stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 
302a4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa
302a5('bum): yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ ra gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mi dmig sa pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa
302a6('bum): nyid la slob pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba
302a7('bum): bzhi la slob pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ stobs lnga la slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i
302a8('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/ tshad med pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
302b1('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
302b2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la slob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin// de bzhin
302b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ byams pa chen po la slob pa yin/ snying rje chen po la slob pa
302b4('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin// / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rnam pa tham
302b5('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gas la ba/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
302b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
302b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu shes te/ gzugs ni ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin par rab tu shes so// 
302b8('bum): de la ji ltar na gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ dbu ba'i phung po snying po meng ba ltar shin tu gsong sdong dang / shin tu gas chags dang / shin tu stong po med par rab tu
303a1('bum): / teng de ltar na/ gzugs shes pa yin no// ji ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ !
303a2('bum): nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang ma song bar shes pa de de ltar gzugs kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs
303a3('bum): / de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin// rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma
303a4('bum): yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na/ tshor ba
303a5('bum): pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na chu'i chu bur gsog du 'dug/ pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar tshor ba skye ba dang / 'jig pa
303a6('bum): pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang dang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du 'ang ma song bar
303a7('bum): pa ste// de ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba mang 'gro ba mang
303a8('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ 'grib ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ byin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin
303b1('bum): ces bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes shes pa zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la chu shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na
303b2('bum): shes shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang ma
303b3('bum): 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 
303b4('bum): 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med 'gro ba mad/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ 
303b5('bum): phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa
303b6('bum): yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ chu shing shun pa so sor phye na snying po shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang
303b7('bum): 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du yang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du yang
303b8('bum): ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar 'du byed kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba
304a1('bum): med 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas
304a2('bum): de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma byed pas sprul
304a3('bum): pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang / 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni
304a4('bum): gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro/ gang gang nas ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste// de ni rnam par
304a5('bum): shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji lta/ ra na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhi nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag 'ong ba med/ 
304a6('bum): 'gro ba med kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byung ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin
304a7('bum): nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong // phyi'i chos
304a8('bum): rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na/ skye mched rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ mig gi khams kyang mig gi
304b1('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
304b2('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sgra'i khams kyang sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i
304b3('bum): khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dri'i khams kyang dri'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
304b4('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i khams kyang lha'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // ro'i khams kyang
304b5('bum): ro'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i rnam pa ra shes pa'i khams kyang lha'i rnam par shes pa'i kha mas kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi khams kyang
304b6('bum): lus kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang
304b7('bum): bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang
304b8('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // zhes bya bar shes te de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ rten
305a1('bum): cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang / don gcig
305a2('bum): pa ma yin pa dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'bral par 'byung ba shes pa yin// ji ltar
305a3('bum): na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i
305a4('bum): bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa yi na/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa
305a5('bum): yin/ gnyis las rnam par 'grol ba 'phags pa'i ba den pa ste/ gnyi su med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhe sa bya bar shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang 'gon
305a6('bum): pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe
305a7('bum): sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/ de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu shes pa yin/ de ltar na 'phags
305a8('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems
305b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phan tshun tha dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na/ des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrugs par mi 'gyur ram
305b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni rnam par dkrugs par yang 'gyur te/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyis
305b3('bum): ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so// gal te dmigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrugs par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'am
305b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi chos kyi dbying sum gtogs pa'i chos gang yang ma dmig so// de ltar ma dmig
305b5('bum): pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no/ sa bya bar btags pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
305b6('bum): byin pa la spyod pas/ chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas gang la
305b7('bum): bslabs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad la bslabs par
305b8('bum): 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags
306a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung ba yang rung ste/ dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams
306a2('bum): kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de ni 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag
306a3('bum): pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad de/ rang
306a4('bum): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos kyi da byings la slob pas chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur
306a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
306a6('bum): ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab
306a7('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar khams dang skye mched rnams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims
306a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting
306b1('bum): 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par 'gyu/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par 'gyi/ ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la
306b2('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
306b3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtha' las
306b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar thob/ ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
306b5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshe// sa thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 
306b6('bum): ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos
306b7('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
306b8('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab
307a1('bum): par gyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan bzhi la
307a2('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ 
307a3('bum): ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ 
307a4('bum): ji ltar mngon par shes pa drug la bslab par 'gyi/ ji lta ra ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
307a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji lta ra so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par 'gyi/ 
307a6('bum): ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar btang snyoms chen po la bslab par bgyi/ 
307a7('bum): ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su grub par bgyi la bslab pa
307a8('bum): bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigasu skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khyim
307b1('bum): bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba
307b2('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phrul dga'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la
307b3('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs lha nye ban gyi
307b4('bum): gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ 
307b5('bum): ji ltar chung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad mang snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la ba slab par bgyi/ ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye bar
307b6('bum): ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dag rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba
307b7('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung che'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lhar skye bar
307b8('bum): bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes med pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bsla
308a1('bum): cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing / der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar rnam shes mtha'
308a2('bum): yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar 'du
308a3('bum): shes ming 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar 'gyi/ ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gnyis pa
308a4('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gsum pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bzhi pa la bslab par 'gyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa lnga pa la bslab
308a5('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa drug pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bdun pa la bslab pa rabagyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa brgyad pa la bslab par
308a6('bum): bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang sangs rgyas
308a7('bum): kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas
308a8('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam la bslabs shing / chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la
308b1('bum): bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par
308b2('bum): bgyi/ 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig la bslab par 'gyi/ rna ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna la bslab par bgyi
308b3('bum): lce la bslab par bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yid la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ sgra la bslab par bgyi/ dri la bslab par bgyi/ ro la bslab par ba
308b4('bum): reg la bslab par bgyi/ chos la bslab par bgyi/ mi ga gi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i rnam
308b5('bum): par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shaMs pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi rnam par sa pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la
308b6('bum): bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la
308b7('bum): bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i
308b8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'du
309a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ chu'i khams la
309a2('bum): bslab par bgyi/ me'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi/ na mkha'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ ma ri
309a3('bum): pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ming dang gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/ reg pa la
309a4('bum): bslab par 'gyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sred pa la ba slab par bgyi/ len pa la bslab par bgyi/ srid pa lta bslab par bgyi/ skye ba la bslab par bgyi/ rga shi la bslal
309a5('bum): par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ brtsom
309a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab par ba
309a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ don dam pa stong pa
309a8('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ thog ma dang
309b1('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi
309b2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par
309b3('bum): bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi
309b4('bum): rkang pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ dbang po rnams la ba slab par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bslab par 'gyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslabs par bgyi/ 
309b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad med pa
309b6('bum): rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
309b7('bum): pa dag la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting
309b8('bum): 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par ba
310a1('bum): mo so yang dag par rig pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
310a2('bum): rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ 
310a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi na/ 
310a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa 'am mi spro ba spros par ba gyid par mi 'gyur lags gang // 
310a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dam pa las brgya bya gcig pa// bcom ldan la/ ngas de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings la ni rnam pa
310a6('bum): rtog pa de dag ma mchis te/ gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mtshas te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
310a7('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
310a8('bum): dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du shes las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
310b1('bum): dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
310b2('bum): kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
310b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
310b4('bum): dbyings nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lta gus/ rna ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te// rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
310b5('bum): kyang rna ba'o// sna yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'o// 
310b6('bum): lce yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lag
310b7('bum): lus las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus so// yid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid las gud na
310b8('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi/ 
311a1('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings kyang gzugs so// sgra yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sgra las gud na yang chos
311a2('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ sgra nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sgra'o// dri yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dri las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchisate/ dri nyid kyang
311a3('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dri'o// ro yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ro las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
311a4('bum): nyid kyang ro'o// reg kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ra ga las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg
311a5('bum): go chos kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chos las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos nyid kyang sa kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo so// mig
311a6('bum): rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa las gus na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// chos kyi
311a7('bum): dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i rna
311a8('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i rnam par shes pa las
311b1('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings
311b2('bum): ma lags/ lce'i rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// 
311b3('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings/ 
311b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yi da kyi rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
311b5('bum): mchis te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma
311b6('bum): lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ 
311b7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
311b8('bum): dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg
312a1('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las gung
312a2('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
312a3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// 
312a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
312a5('bum): so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
312a6('bum): tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
312a7('bum): ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rna ba'i 'dus
312a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyis
312b1('bum): ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
312b2('bum): nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos
312b3('bum): kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus
312b4('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings pa lags/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
312b5('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang chos kyi
312b6('bum): dbyings ma lags yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// 
312b7('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 
312b8('bum): sa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags// chu'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
313a1('bum): ma mchis te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ me'i khams las
313a2('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyis ma mchis te/ me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags// rlung gi
313a3('bum): khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi kham so// nam mkha'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
313a4('bum): nam mkha'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchi sa te/ na mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang na mkha'i khams so// rnam
313a5('bum): shes pa'i khams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma ma chis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi ngophyi/ 
313a6('bum): so/ chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ma rig pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang
313a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'du byed las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'du byed nyid kyi
313a8('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par shes pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 
313b1('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ming dang gzugs las gung na/ 
313b2('bum): yang ma kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ming dang gzugs nying cham kya byings so// chom kyi dbyas nying kyang meng dang gzugs so// skye mched drun kya chos kyi dbyangs ma lags
313b3('bum): mched drug las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma
313b4('bum): lags/ reg pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
313b5('bum): tshor ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyis nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lag/ 
313b6('bum): sred pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sred pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ len pa las
313b7('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ len pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ srid pa las gud na yang
313b8('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ skye ba las gud na yang chos kyi dbyin
314a1('bum): pa mchis te/ skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rga shi las gud na yang chos
314a2('bum): dbyings ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
314a3('bum): gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
314a4('bum): phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos
314a5('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ya nga chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
314a6('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus
314a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
314a8('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ bsam gtan gyi
314b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha
314b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ shes
314b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ nang stong pa
314b4('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
314b5('bum): lags/ phyi stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi da ngas ma mchis te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi da byings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// 
314b6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyi nang stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbus
314b7('bum): nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stong pa nyid stong pa
314b8('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ chen po stong pa nyid las gung na yang chos kyi da
315a1('bum): ma mchis te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 
315a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas
315a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
315a4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang cho sa kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las gang na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
315a5('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi de kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mtha' las 'das pa
315a6('bum): pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo // thog ma dang
315a7('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos dbying
315a8('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 
315b1('bum): dong ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid las
315b2('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang bzhir stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
315b3('bum): ma lags/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong
315b4('bum): pa nyid // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos
315b5('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan te nga stong pa nyid do// mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las gu
315b6('bum): na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi
315b7('bum): dbyings ma lags/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med
315b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
316a1('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las gud na
316a2('bum): yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
316a3('bum): rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dang
316a4('bum): nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
316a5('bum): te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags
316a6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam so// dbang po
316a7('bum): rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dbang po rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbying nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs
316a8('bum): rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnams so// 
316b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings pa lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings
316b2('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// lam yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// 
316b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang lam mo// 'phags pa'i bded pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 'a'ag
316b4('bum): pa'i bded pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags// bsam gtan rnams
316b5('bum): las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ bsam ga tan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa rnams kyang
316b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// 
316b7('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzugs
316b8('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i spoms par 'jug pa rnam so// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam
317a1('bum): par thar pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnam so// mthar gyi
317a2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mthar gyis
317a3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
317a4('bum): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te// 
317a5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
317a6('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ 
317a7('bum): mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin rnams las
317a8('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lag
317b1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin
317b2('bum): pa'i stobs rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang
317b3('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa rnams las gung na
317b4('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sa kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang
317b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam sa las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
317b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ byams pa chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ byams
317b7('bum): pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po yang chos kyi dbyings pa ma lags/ snying rje chen po las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
317b8('bum): ma mchis te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags// sangs rgyas kyi chos
318a1('bum): ma 'dres pa rnams las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos pa'i'adres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings med kyang sangs rgya
318a2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rgyun tu zhug
318a3('bum): pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lan cig phyir
318a4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu las gung na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir
318a5('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las gud na yang chos kyi dbye ngas ma mchis te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos
318a6('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis
318a7('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rang byang chub las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma
318a8('bum): mchis te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lnga
318b1('bum): gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
318b2('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings ma mchis te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
318b3('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// gzugs nyid kyang chos
318b4('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzug so// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
318b5('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed nyid chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed// / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyi
318b6('bum): nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig go// rna ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna yid kyang chos kyi
318b7('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snga'o// lce nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'o// lus nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang luso// yid nyid kyang
318b8('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid do// gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugaso// sgra nyid chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid krung sgra
319a1('bum): dri nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dra'o// ro nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshar// reg nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
319a2('bum): nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos rnam so// mig rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi rnam par
319a3('bum): pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi
319a4('bum): dbyings nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes par sha
319a5('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang tshe sa kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi rnam pa
319a6('bum): pa'o// mig 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i
319a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
319a8('bum): nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang chos kyi
319b1('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// tshad kyi rgya ma kyang cog 'as te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba// na pa'i da ga
319b2('bum): ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// 
319b3('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'idang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te
319b4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dpyid cid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
319b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi byings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te ra ga pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid kyang chos
319b6('bum): kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos
319b7('bum): dbyings nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi
319b8('bum): nam mkha'i kham so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyi
320a1('bum): kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'du byed ngo // rnam par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par
320a2('bum): shes pa'o// ming dang gzugs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ming dang gzug so// skye mched drug nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye mched drug go// ga
320a3('bum): pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sring po nyid kyang chos kyi
320a4('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa nyi da kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan pa'o// srid pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyis
320a5('bum): nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid kyang chos kyi dbyi ngas so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha
320a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang
320a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
320a8('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam
320b1('bum): gtan bya la ga tu phyin par// shes rab tu pha rom tu phyin pa da kyang chas kyi dbyam sa// cham kyang bya ma nad kyang shes rab kyi ma rog tu phyin par/ nang sung ba nyid kya sa
320b2('bum): mong chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos
320b3('bum): kyi dbyings nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyim
320b4('bum): chos kyi dbyi nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kya
320b5('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
320b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
320b7('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// dong ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong
320b8('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// 
321a1('bum): / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
321a2('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa
321a3('bum): nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i
321a4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang
321a5('bum): chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang yang dag pa ra spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kya sa kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi
321a6('bum): rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang stobs rnam
321a7('bum): so/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyingaso// / 
321a8('bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnamaso// 
321b1('bum): bsam gtan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// 
321b2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa nyid kyang chos
321b3('bum): kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mthar gyis
321b4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smo na pa med pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings
321b5('bum): nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mngon
321b6('bum): par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang chos kyi dbying so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
321b7('bum): kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa nyid
321b8('bum): kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang so so yang dag rig
322a1('bum): pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang byams pa chen por// snying rje chen po nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// 
322a2('bum): / chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa rnam so// 
322a3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi
322a4('bum): dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid
322a5('bum): kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub nyid kyang chos
322a6('bum): kyi dbyingaso// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams
322a7('bum): cad mkhyed pa nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings so// chos kyi dbyings nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
322a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings la ma gtogs pa'i chos 'ga' zhig mthong na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par
322b1('bum): yang mi 'gyur te/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams
322b2('bum): cang chos kyi dbyings su shes nas chos thams cad ming med pa la ming gi brdas chos ston te/ 'di ni gzugs shes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni 'du shes zhes bya'o// 
322b3('bum): 'di ni 'du byed ces bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'dzin mig ces bya'o// 'di ni rna ba zhes bya'o// 'dzi ni snga zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce zhes bya'o// 'dzin lus shes
322b4('bum): bya'o// 'do ni yid ces bya'o// 'di ni gzugs zhes bya 'o// 'di ni sgra zhes bya'o// 'di ni dri zhes bya'o// 'din ro zhe bya'o// 'di ni reg ces bya'o// 'di ni chos zhes bya'o// 
322b5('bum): 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni na ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes
322b6('bum): bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o/ 
322b7('bum): 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni mig gi 'dus
322b8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i
323a1('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sa'i khams
323a2('bum): zhes bya'o// 'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni me'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni rlung gi khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni na mkha'i khams zhes bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes
323a3('bum): bya'o// 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o// 'do na 'du byed ces bya'o// 'di ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o// 'di ni skye mched drug ces bya'o// 'di ni reg pa
323a4('bum): zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshor ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni sred pa zhes bya'o// / 'di ni len pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni srid pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni skye ba zhes bya'o// 'di ni rga shi zhes bya'o// 'di ni sbyin pa
323a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sa bya'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
323a6('bum): bya'o// 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di
323a7('bum): ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa
323a8('bum): nyid ces bya'o// don 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// don thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces
